user_profile.name: Tariq Najjar
user_profile.description: Tariq is a 50-year-old Middle Eastern academic with an outgoing personality, known for his detailed approach to life despite his beginner status in technology. Although he feels a strong urgency to complete tasks like ordering groceries online due to his limited previous experience, he maintains a cautious decision-making style while being very risk-taking in other aspects of life. His athletic lifestyle allows him to adapt quickly to new physical activities, although he finds himself more comfortable communicating in technical terms, often preferring auditory learning to enhance his skills.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

examples: I need a new smartphone. What do you recommend?
Looking for a laptop for gaming. Options?
Need a home security system. What's available?
